channel.title: Comments on: Green Banana Flour Waffles (AIP & low-FODMAP)

item.title: By: Joy Sladick
item.dc:creator: Joy Sladick
item.description: I absolutely LOVE this recipe. My non AIP husband says they are the best also!! My only issue (and It may be my banana four) is I always have to add almost a full cup of liquid to get the consistency right. I add half coconut milk and half water. They are so delicious! Thank you!!!
item.content:encoded: I absolutely LOVE this recipe. My non AIP husband says they are the best also!! My only issue (and It may be my banana four) is I always have to add almost a full cup of liquid to get the consistency right. I add half coconut milk and half water. They are so delicious! Thank you!!!

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/green-banana-flour-waffles-aip-low-fodmap/#comment-502">Veronica</a>.
Hi Veronica, thanks for reaching out. While I haven't tried the waffles with almond milk, I think it should probably work. Let me know if you give it a try - I would love to know it works for you!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Veronica.

Hi Veronica, thanks for reaching out. While I haven’t tried the waffles with almond milk, I think it should probably work. Let me know if you give it a try – I would love to know it works for you!

item.title: By: Veronica
item.dc:creator: Veronica
item.description: Can I use almond milk instead of the full fat coconut milk?
item.content:encoded: Can I use almond milk instead of the full fat coconut milk?

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/green-banana-flour-waffles-aip-low-fodmap/#comment-464">Joy Sladick</a>.
Hi Joy, thank you so much for leaving a review! I am so happy to hear that you and your husband enjoyed the waffles. They are one of my favorites!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Joy Sladick.

Hi Joy, thank you so much for leaving a review! I am so happy to hear that you and your husband enjoyed the waffles. They are one of my favorites!

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/green-banana-flour-waffles-aip-low-fodmap/#comment-386">Jennifer</a>.
I am so happy to hear the whole family enjoyed the recipe! Thank you for taking the time to leave a review.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jennifer.

I am so happy to hear the whole family enjoyed the recipe! Thank you for taking the time to leave a review.

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: These waffles were so easy and quick to make! First time using banana flour for me, and I am hooked! I've already made two batches, my kids gobbled them up with some maple syrup on top.
item.content:encoded: These waffles were so easy and quick to make! First time using banana flour for me, and I am hooked! I’ve already made two batches, my kids gobbled them up with some maple syrup on top.
